name: Lights Out (itch) (efarrisgames)
description:
This is an invitation to the best and last party you'll ever attend. Wear your best, we’re going out with a bang. Happy New World! 

The tallest tower in the city is hosting two different parties at the same time, the one on the rooftop penthouse and the one in the basement bunker. You can only end the night at one. Choose wisely, then achieve your goals before midnight. Don’t you know it’s the end of the world?

A caltrop core game about partying at the end of the world and what you choose to do with the last few hours on earth. Made as part of  Caltrop Jam 2!

Made using Caltrop Core by titanomachy at https:// titanomachyRPG.itch.io
